name: Scary & Laugh - Mathematics
description:
Scary!!! Scary!! Scary!!
Laugh, laugh, laugh ®


This unique game which is a combination of learning maths, laughing moment & scarring/fearing scenes.

Answer correct some of the mathematics expression and find laughing video.

If you will give some of the wrong answers then you will find scary video too :D

It will be really awesome experience with learning, ​scarring and laughing.
